meaningMnemonic: A <radical>tsunami</radical> hits a <radical>bundle</radical> of <radical>geoduck</radical>s, swirling around their weird shapes, and creating <kanji>rapids</kanji>! The rapids are so violent, some of the geoducks break out of the bundle and get washed into the <kanji>shallows</kanji>.
readingMnemonic: While those geoducks are getting tossed about in the <kanji>rapids</kanji>, you're sitting in the <kanji>shallows</kanji> chomping down on some <reading>ce</reading>lery (せ).
